instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' for icons, 'framer-motion' for animations, and 'three' + '@react-three/fiber' + '@react-three/drei' for 3D.
2. TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'obsidian', 'charcoal', and 'gold' colors immediately.
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css.

4. 3D HERO: Create a 'CurrencyCanvas' component. If a complex model isn't available, create a procedural 'Gold Card' using R3F primitives (BoxGeometry) with a gold material (MeshStandardMaterial with high metalness/roughness).
5. FORM: Build the research form with distinct steps or a clean vertical layout. It must feel like a legal document or an exclusive application.
6. ANIMATION: Use Framer Motion for text reveals (staggered fade-up). The 3D element should rotate slowly on scroll.
7. GLASSMORPHISM: Apply the glass classes to the Navbar and any floating cards.
8. IMAGES: Use the 'hero_bg_texture' as a subtle overlay (opacity 10-20%) in the background of the Hero or Credibility section.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
